              <div class="Grid-cell">
                <div class="ProfileSidebar ProfileSidebar--withLeftAlignment">
  <div class="ProfileHeaderCard">
  <h1 class="ProfileHeaderCard-name">
    <a href="/angie4wealden" class="ProfileHeaderCard-nameLink u-textInheritColor js-nav">Angie Smith</a>
  </h1>

  <h2 class="ProfileHeaderCard-screenname u-inlineBlock u-dir" dir="ltr">
    <a class="ProfileHeaderCard-screennameLink u-linkComplex js-nav" href="/angie4wealden">
      <span class="username u-dir" dir="ltr">@<b class="u-linkComplex-target">angie4wealden</b></span>
    </a>
  </h2>

  

      <p class="ProfileHeaderCard-bio u-dir" dir="ltr">I'm a mum, feminist, socialist,  DV professional and Labour Parliamentary Candidate for Wealden. I'm committed to fighting Tory attacks on state safety nets.</p>

      <div class="ProfileHeaderCard-location ">
        <span class="Icon Icon--geo Icon--medium" aria-hidden="true" role="presentation"></span>
        <span class="ProfileHeaderCard-locationText u-dir" dir="ltr">
              Wealden, East Sussex

        </span>
      </div>

      <div class="ProfileHeaderCard-url  u-hidden">
        <span class="Icon Icon--url Icon--medium" aria-hidden="true" role="presentation"></span>
        <span class="ProfileHeaderCard-urlText u-dir">
</span>
      </div>


      <div class="ProfileHeaderCard-joinDate">
        <span class="Icon Icon--calendar Icon--medium" aria-hidden="true" role="presentation"></span>
        <span class="ProfileHeaderCard-joinDateText js-tooltip u-dir" dir="ltr" title="6:38 am - 3 May 2017">Joined May 2017</span>
      </div>

        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">So pleased about this news. <a href="/carolynharris24" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="2406093795"><s>@</s><b>carolynharris24</b></a> campaigned so tenaciously and with such dignity.     </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount ">
        <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">82</span>
      </span>
  </button>
</div>

    <div class="ProfileTweet-action ProfileTweet-action--retweet js-toggleState js-toggleRt">
  <button class="ProfileTweet-actionButton  js-actionButton js-actionRetweet" data-modal="ProfileTweet-retweet" type="button" aria-describedby="profile-tweet-action-retweet-count-aria-977195029105139713">

    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">999</span>
  </span>

  </button><button class="ProfileTweet-actionButtonUndo js-actionButton js-actionRetweet" data-modal="ProfileTweet-retweet" type="button">

      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount ProfileTweet-actionCount--isZero">

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Amy Fowler Retweeted Angie Smith</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">So looking forward to speaking at the Women of Wealden Festival next month with <a href="/ThePennyDrops" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="119000626"><s>@</s><b>ThePennyDrops</b></a>. Well done <a href="/angie4wealden" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="859764151849189376"><s>@</s><b>angie4wealden</b></a> for organising such a great event!<a href="https://t.co/oCLzN1L8bo" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/angie4wealden/status/975850336836571136" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/angie4wealden/status/975850336836571136"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/angie4wealden/</span><span class="invisible">status/975850336836571136</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Amy Fowler added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">
  <div class="QuoteTweet-container">
    <a class="QuoteTweet-link js-nav" href="/angie4wealden/status/975850336836571136" data-conversation-id="975850336836571136" aria-hidden="true">
    </a>
    <div class="QuoteTweet-innerContainer u-cf js-permalink js-media-container" data-item-id="975850336836571136" data-item-type="tweet" data-screen-name="angie4wealden" data-user-id="859764151849189376" href="/angie4wealden/status/975850336836571136" data-conversation-id="975850336836571136" tabindex="0">
      <div class="tweet-content">
        <div class="QuoteTweet-authorAndText u-alignTop">
            
  <div class="QuoteTweet-originalAuthor u-cf u-textTruncate stream-item-header account-group js-user-profile-link">
    <b class="QuoteTweet-fullname u-linkComplex-target">Angie Smith</b><span class="UserBadges"></span><span class="UserNameBreak"></span><span class="username u-dir u-textTruncate" dir="ltr">@<b>angie4wealden</b></span>
  </div>

          
          
          <div class="QuoteTweet-text tweet-text u-dir" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="2" dir="ltr">Check out the very first "Women of Wealden Festival". There's never been an event like it in Wealden.

        <span class="child-confirmation-text"></span>
        <span class="undo-child-feedback-action">Undo</span>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Happy <a href="/hashtag/BSLRecognitionDay?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>BSLRecognitionDay</b></a>! 
We want to give all British Sign Language users the equality and recognition they deserve. 
Thats why the next Labour Government will introduce the BSL Act.

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Stephen Hawking inspired the world with his determination to explain the mysteries of the cosmos. But he also showed breathtaking courage to overcome life's adversities and a burning passion to protect our National Health Service. He will be greatly missed.</p>

    <div class="AdaptiveMedia&#10;        &#10;        is-square&#10;        &#10;        &#10;        &#10;        ">

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0"><a href="/hashtag/WASPI?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>WASPI</b></a> <img class="Emoji Emoji--forText" src="https://abs.twimg.com/emoji/v2/72x72/1f41d.png" draggable="false" alt="" title="Honeybee" aria-label="Emoji: Honeybee" /><img class="Emoji Emoji--forText" src="https://abs.twimg.com/emoji/v2/72x72/1f41d.png" draggable="false" alt="" title="Honeybee" aria-label="Emoji: Honeybee" /><img class="Emoji Emoji--forText" src="https://abs.twimg.com/emoji/v2/72x72/1f41d.png" draggable="false" alt="" title="Honeybee" aria-label="Emoji: Honeybee" /><img class="Emoji Emoji--forText" src="https://abs.twimg.com/emoji/v2/72x72/1f41d.png" draggable="false" alt="" title="Honeybee" aria-label="Emoji: Honeybee" /><img class="Emoji Emoji--forText" src="https://abs.twimg.com/emoji/v2/72x72/1f41d.png" draggable="false" alt="" title="Honeybee" aria-label="Emoji: Honeybee" /><img class="Emoji Emoji--forText" src="https://abs.twimg.com/emoji/v2/72x72/1f41d.png" draggable="false" alt="" title="Honeybee" aria-label="Emoji: Honeybee" /> 8k per year robbed from 1950s women but millions given to the super rich &amp; big corporations in tax breaks <img class="Emoji Emoji--forText" src="https://abs.twimg.com/emoji/v2/72x72/1f92c.png" draggable="false" alt="" title="Face with symbols over mouth" aria-label="Emoji: Face with symbols over mouth" /> Its not that the money isn't there BIG LIE It's the choices made by government where "our" money goes</p>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">There's something for everyone at the first Women of Wealden Festival in Uckfield on April 28th. Like the proper <a href="/hashtag/wow2018?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>wow2018</b></a>?  Then you'll like this. Just a short ride from London on the train.<a href="https://t.co/gJPeKUJyno" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/angie4wealden/status/971802037104111617" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/angie4wealden/status/971802037104111617"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/angie4wealden/</span><span class="invisible">status/971802037104111617</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Vince Maple Retweeted Britain Elects</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Thanks once again for every single <a href="/UKLabour" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="14291684"><s>@</s><b>UKLabour</b></a> Activist that made this happen, a particular thanks to <a href="/Harinder__Singh" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="1407491868"><s>@</s><b>Harinder__Singh</b></a> &amp; <a href="/TobyForster88" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="877107177907007488"><s>@</s><b>TobyForster88</b></a> whose energy, enthusiasm and talent added percentage points to the 26.5% <a href="/hashtag/ForTheMany?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>ForTheMany</b></a><a href="https://t.co/qWI9S3WqAP" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/britainelects/status/971894222231166978" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/britainelects/status/971894222231166978"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/britainelects/</span><span class="invisible">status/971894222231166978</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Vince Maple added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">

        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">I often wonder if <a href="/hashtag/Tory?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>Tory</b></a> voters live in an alternate reality.  Do they really not see that <a href="/hashtag/austerity?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>austerity</b></a> is killing people through benefit cuts / sanctions and cuts in public services for vulnerable people? You can't be a <a href="/hashtag/Conservative?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>Conservative</b></a> and have a conscience.</p>

      <strong class="fullname show-popup-with-id u-textTruncate ">Angie Smith</strong><span></span><span class="UserBadges"></span><span class="UserNameBreak"></span></span><span class="username u-dir u-textTruncate" dir="ltr">@<b>angie4wealden</b></span></a>

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Angie Smith Retweeted Norma Ferrie</p>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Beginning to wonder if George Orwell was psychic.<a href="https://t.co/GEl3b1bXbF" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/NormaFerrie/status/969961618800103424" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/NormaFerrie/status/969961618800103424"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/NormaFerrie/st</span><span class="invisible">atus/969961618800103424</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>

        <span class="Icon Icon--caretDownLight Icon--small"></span>

      </div>
  </button>
  <div class="dropdown-menu is-autoCentered">

  <ul>

      </li>

        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Embed Tweet</button>
      </li>
  </ul>
</div>

</div>

  </div>

      </div>

      

      


      
        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Lovely Review of my Live Album from <a href="/Folkmaster" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="470135187"><s>@</s><b>folkmaster</b></a>.   <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Yet another example of how this government is failing vulnerable people whose voices are not heard above the clamour of right-wing hypocrisy.<a href="https://t.co/svNeoEzDCQ" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/imajsaclaimant/status/966444777800597504" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/imajsaclaimant/status/966444777800597504"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/imajsaclaimant</span><span class="invisible">/status/966444777800597504</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Rose Collis Retweeted Equity</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Excited and proud to be writing and presenting this all-new illustrated talk for <a href="/EquityLGBT" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="480705738"><s>@</s><b>EquityLGBT</b></a> <a href="/EquityUK" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="20604398"><s>@</s><b>EquityUK</b></a> <a href="/LGBTHM" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="140025559"><s>@</s><b>LGBTHM</b></a><a href="https://t.co/ybItILoDtE" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/EquityUK/status/953292588429250560" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/EquityUK/status/953292588429250560"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/EquityUK/statu</span><span class="invisible">s/953292588429250560</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Rose Collis added,</p>

          <div class="QuoteTweet-text tweet-text u-dir" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="2" dir="ltr">For LGBT History month this February, performer, writer and historian <span class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="2905040170"><s>@</s><b>RoseCollis1</b></span> will give a talk on Equity's founders - and their friends - in LGBT History, with an introduction by London Night Czar <span class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="20912252"><s>@</s><b>amylame</b></span>. </div>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Delighted to be shortlisted for the <a href="/UKLabour" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="14291684"><s>@</s><b>UKLabour</b></a> Parliamentary Candidate selection <a href="/hashtag/Dover?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>Dover</b></a> &amp; <a href="/hashtag/Deal?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>Deal</b></a> and the villages.           <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Karl Williams Retweeted Katie Tudor</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">This is now becoming a disgusting trend. Quite frankly a trend that isnt very popular! 

When will people realise that we dont do this on purpose to inconvenience people

I hate to see battles between us and the public but seriously this is ridiculous.

Give us a break will you<a href="https://t.co/yWZ3mksHT9" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/wmaskatietudor/status/965212715366211587" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/wmaskatietudor/status/965212715366211587"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/wmaskatietudor</span><span class="invisible">/status/965212715366211587</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Karl Williams added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">
  <div class="QuoteTweet-container">
    <a class="QuoteTweet-link js-nav" href="/wmaskatietudor/status/965212715366211587" data-conversation-id="965212715366211587" aria-hidden="true">
    </a>
    <div class="QuoteTweet-innerContainer u-cf js-permalink js-media-container" data-item-id="965212715366211587" data-item-type="tweet" data-screen-name="wmaskatietudor" data-user-id="918120668285362176" href="/wmaskatietudor/status/965212715366211587" data-conversation-id="965212715366211587" tabindex="0">
      <div class="tweet-content">
            <div class="QuoteMedia">
      <div class="QuoteMedia-container js-quote-media-container">
          <div class="QuoteMedia-singlePhoto">
    <div class="QuoteMedia-photoContainer js-quote-photo" data-image-url="https://pbs.twimg.com/media/DWUf1tXXkAAUHQB.jpg" data-element-context="platform_photo_card" style="background-color:rgba(50,55,64,1.0);" data-dominant-color="[50,55,64]">

          <div class="QuoteTweet-text tweet-text u-dir" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="2" dir="ltr">So upset to be sent this by one of our crews this morning!   <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">New planning application in to develop Sidley Sports Ground. Only Labour is helping local residents access the plans so that they can respond. If you want to help message <a href="/BexhillLabour" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="885524569297231872"><s>@</s><b>BexhillLabour</b></a> <a href="/hashtag/labourlistens?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>labourlistens</b></a> <a href="/BBLabour" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="807394456123150339"><s>@</s><b>BBLabour</b></a> <a href="/BBYLabour" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="849370943529111552"><s>@</s><b>BBYLabour</b></a><a href="https://t.co/RxfcVX2Gsn" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/RxfcVX2Gsn</a></p>
</div>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Tell Premier Inn to clean up their act, and work with <a href="/unitetheunion" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="20593641"><s>@</s><b>unitetheunion</b></a> to stop exploitative work practices.   <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">The pressure on our police force is about to increase. Why? Because the Tories just voted for further real-terms cuts. 

Find out how police cuts affect your community <a href="https://t.co/2iPZ9E4pCP" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="http://labour.org.uk/police" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="http://labour.org.uk/police"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">http://</span><span class="js-display-url">labour.org.uk/police</span><span class="invisible"></span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Data from <a href="/DWP" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="274569960"><s>@</s><b>DWP</b></a> shows that most lone parents affected by the benefit cap have under school age children. This is because to be exempt from the cap they have to work 16 hours pw - an impossibility for many parents, given the cost of child care for toddlers,<a href="https://t.co/BADSvgYr8y" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/BADSvgYr8y</a></p>

        <span class="child-confirmation-text"></span>
        <span class="undo-child-feedback-action">Undo</span>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">David first experimented with Brexit in June 2016. Back then he thought it was just a bit of fun - he could handle it. 

19 months on, his Brexit use has spun out of control and the damage from his addiction is clear to see. 

Kids: if youre offered Brexit, just say no.<a href="https://t.co/Uei5aoeuKc" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/Uei5aoeuKc</a></p>

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Angie Smith Retweeted The Labour Party</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">This video needs to be shown on TV. It carries such a powerful message that sadly people are closing their ears too. <a href="/hashtag/savetheNHS?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>savetheNHS</b></a><a href="https://t.co/AV2g6Tz7wW" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/UKLabour/status/953695925351866370" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/UKLabour/status/953695925351866370"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/UKLabour/statu</span><span class="invisible">s/953695925351866370</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Angie Smith added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">

        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Today I visited an English women's prison. It holds 340 women aged 18+, the oldest in her 70s.

Most of the women:

- are mothers
- are victims of abuse &amp; violence
- are serving sentences for non-violent crime
- 60% have suffered a brain injury
- are a 100+ miles from family
<img class="Emoji Emoji--forText" src="https://abs.twimg.com/emoji/v2/72x72/2b07.png" draggable="false" alt="" title="Down-pointing arrow" aria-label="Emoji: Down-pointing arrow" /></p>
</div>

            <div class="AdaptiveMediaOuterContainer">

        <div class="feedback-action" data-feedback-type="DontLike" data-feedback-url="">
          <div class="action-confirmation dismiss-module-item">Thanks. Twitter will use this info to make your timeline better.
            <span class="undo-action">Undo</span>

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Angie Smith Retweeted The Labour Party</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">As a Southern commuter and Labour Party activist, I was proud to leaflet at my station this morning,  to highlight the <a href="/hashtag/GreatToryTrainRobbery?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>GreatToryTrainRobbery</b></a><a href="https://t.co/n9ZYL7dCf2" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/UKLabour/status/948253076762193921" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/UKLabour/status/948253076762193921"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/UKLabour/statu</span><span class="invisible">s/948253076762193921</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Angie Smith added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">
  <div class="QuoteTweet-container">
    <a class="QuoteTweet-link js-nav" href="/UKLabour/status/948253076762193921" data-conversation-id="948253076762193921" aria-hidden="true">
    </a>
    <div class="QuoteTweet-innerContainer u-cf js-permalink js-media-container" data-item-id="948253076762193921" data-item-type="tweet" data-screen-name="UKLabour" data-user-id="14291684" href="/UKLabour/status/948253076762193921" data-conversation-id="948253076762193921" tabindex="0">

This is the Great Tory Train Robbery. <span data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>RailFail</b></span>

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">London Fire Brigade Retweeted Wayne Johnson</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">It was firefighters who tackled the Grenfell fire. The medias use of the outdated term fireman leaves our women firefighters including <a href="/LFBCommissioner" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="537121594"><s>@</s><b>LFBCommissioner</b></a> behind. In 2018 we will continue <a href="/hashtag/FirefightingSexism?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>FirefightingSexism</b></a> as our staff deserve to be called what they have been for the past 30 years<a href="https://t.co/I0FyL7Lcj1" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/lfb_wayne/status/947096164670853120" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/lfb_wayne/status/947096164670853120"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/lfb_wayne/stat</span><span class="invisible">us/947096164670853120</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Can I get re tweets to put a big smile on my step daughters Lucy Wood face.
She has had six brain operations due to brain tumour been removed.
Spent 10 months in ICU

She has just started to eat blended foods &amp; is learning to talk &amp; walk again.

A fighter she is indeed.<a href="https://t.co/JANMhGdYzg" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/JANMhGdYzg</a></p>

</li><li class="js-stream-item stream-item stream-item&#10;" data-item-id="946398370771464192" id="stream-item-tweet-946398370771464192" data-item-type="tweet" data-suggestion-json="{&quot;suggestion_details&quot;:{},&quot;tweet_ids&quot;:&quot;946398370771464192&quot;,&quot;scribe_component&quot;:&quot;tweet&quot;}">

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Have a great Christmas. For most families it's a joyous time when we come together. It's not right that 9000 people are sleeping rough and 120,000 children have no permanent home this Christmas. Thats why we need a Labour government that wont accept people have to be homeless.<a href="https://t.co/llh6LXWpyZ" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/llh6LXWpyZ</a></p>

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Angie Smith Retweeted long tweets mcgee</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">This is such an important message.  My own county, East Sussex,  are currently consulting on library closures. People without knowledge are people without power. <a href="/hashtag/fight?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>fight</b></a> library closures.<a href="https://t.co/dgQbkMYVoH" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/_Amanda_Killian/status/943900364981534720" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/_Amanda_Killian/status/943900364981534720"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/_Amanda_Killia</span><span class="invisible">n/status/943900364981534720</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Angie Smith added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">
  <div class="QuoteTweet-container">
    <a class="QuoteTweet-link js-nav" href="/_Amanda_Killian/status/943900364981534720" data-conversation-id="943900364981534720" aria-hidden="true">
    </a>
    <div class="QuoteTweet-innerContainer u-cf js-permalink js-media-container" data-item-id="943900364981534720" data-item-type="tweet" data-screen-name="_Amanda_Killian" data-user-id="2822071535" href="/_Amanda_Killian/status/943900364981534720" data-conversation-id="943900364981534720" tabindex="0">
      <div class="tweet-content">
        <div class="QuoteTweet-authorAndText u-alignTop">
            
  <div class="QuoteTweet-originalAuthor u-cf u-textTruncate stream-item-header account-group js-user-profile-link">
    <b class="QuoteTweet-fullname u-linkComplex-target">long tweets mcgee</b><span class="UserBadges"></span><span class="UserNameBreak"></span><span class="username u-dir u-textTruncate" dir="ltr">@<b>_Amanda_Killian</b></span>
  </div>

          
          
          <div class="QuoteTweet-text tweet-text u-dir" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="2" dir="ltr">Libraries literally aren't just a place to obtain books for free. They're one of the few public spaces left in our society where you're allowed to exist without the expectation of spending money.</div>
        </div>
      </div>

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Angie Smith Retweeted Jeremy Corbyn</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">I second this, but would go further: women's refuges need to be run by specialist women's orgs, not housing associations.<a href="https://t.co/sJG7zZL6eY" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/jeremycorbyn/status/934480894236217347" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/jeremycorbyn/status/934480894236217347"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/jeremycorbyn/s</span><span class="invisible">tatus/934480894236217347</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>

      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">
  <div class="QuoteTweet-container">

<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">My first <a href="/LabourList" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="18874097"><s>@</s><b>LabourList</b></a> article and I'm proud to writing about an important issue on <a href="/hashtag/IDEVAW?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>IDEVAW</b></a>.

    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">25</span>
  </span>

  </button><button class="ProfileTweet-actionButtonUndo ProfileTweet-action--unfavorite u-linkClean js-actionButton js-actionFavorite" type="button">
    <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="Undo like">
      <span role="presentation" class="Icon Icon--heart Icon--medium"></span>
      <div class="HeartAnimation"></div>
      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Liked</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount">

    <div class="AdaptiveMedia&#10;        &#10;        is-square&#10;        &#10;        &#10;        &#10;        ">

        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">We did a survey of headteachers in <a href="/hashtag/Brighton?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>Brighton</b></a> and <a href="/hashtag/Hove?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>Hove</b></a> - asking them what cuts they have made. These are their responses. We call it the <a href="/hashtag/CatalogueOfCuts?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>CatalogueOfCuts</b></a> pls rt <a href="/hashtag/schoolcuts?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>schoolcuts</b></a> <a href="/hashtag/tellthechancellor?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>tellthechancellor</b></a> <a href="/hashtag/budget2017?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>budget2017</b></a> <a href="/hashtag/futurestealers?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>futurestealers</b></a><a href="https://t.co/Xvt9QDVGis" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/Xvt9QDVGis</a></p>
</div>

        <span class="child-confirmation-text"></span>
        <span class="undo-child-feedback-action">Undo</span>
      </div>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">For 7 years we have suffered under austerity. For what? A failing economy. 
The Tories MUST deliver these 5 things in the budget next week.<a href="https://t.co/NeE5rhdn6X" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/NeE5rhdn6X</a></p>

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Labour Press Team Retweeted Tom Newton Dunn</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Shameful. Michael Gove more concerned with protecting Boris Johnson's job than protecting Nazanin Zaghari-Ratcliffe <a href="/hashtag/Marr?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>Marr</b></a><a href="https://t.co/uMAu3uYhiz" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/tnewtondunn/status/929650282480402437" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/tnewtondunn/status/929650282480402437"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/tnewtondunn/st</span><span class="invisible">atus/929650282480402437</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>

          <div class="action-confirmation dismiss-module-item">Thanks. Twitter will use this info to make your timeline better.

      <div class="stream-item-header">
          <a class="account-group js-account-group js-action-profile js-user-profile-link js-nav" href="/LauraPidcockMP" data-user-id="251821643">
      <img class="avatar js-action-profile-avatar" src="https://pbs.twimg.com/profile_images/881901319283408896/7Wi-9U1d_bigger.jpg" alt="" />
    <span class="FullNameGroup">
      <strong class="fullname show-popup-with-id u-textTruncate " data-aria-label-part="">Laura Pidcock MP</strong><span></span><span class="UserBadges"><span class="Icon Icon--verified"><span class="u-hiddenVisually">Verified account</span></span></span><span class="UserNameBreak"></span></span><span class="username u-dir u-textTruncate" dir="ltr" data-aria-label-part="">@<b>LauraPidcockMP</b></span></a>

        
        <small class="time">

<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Rents are rising to unmanageable levels in Wealden. We need genuinely affordable homes for local people to rent and buy.<a href="https://t.co/hX7YmoKqax" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/pollyn1/status/921696556729978880" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/pollyn1/status/921696556729978880"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/pollyn1/status</span><span class="invisible">/921696556729978880</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Angie Smith added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">
  <div class="QuoteTweet-container">
    <a class="QuoteTweet-link js-nav" href="/pollyn1/status/921696556729978880" data-conversation-id="921696556729978880" aria-hidden="true">
    </a>
    <div class="QuoteTweet-innerContainer u-cf js-permalink js-media-container" data-item-id="921696556729978880" data-item-type="tweet" data-screen-name="pollyn1" data-user-id="249700670" href="/pollyn1/status/921696556729978880" data-conversation-id="921696556729978880" tabindex="0">
      <div class="tweet-content">
        <div class="QuoteTweet-authorAndText u-alignTop">
            
  <div class="QuoteTweet-originalAuthor u-cf u-textTruncate stream-item-header account-group js-user-profile-link">
    <b class="QuoteTweet-fullname u-linkComplex-target">Polly Neate</b><span class="UserBadges"><span class="Icon Icon--verified"><span class="u-hiddenVisually">Verified account</span></span></span><span class="UserNameBreak"></span><span class="username u-dir u-textTruncate" dir="ltr">@<b>pollyn1</b></span>
  </div>

          
          
          <div class="QuoteTweet-text tweet-text u-dir" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="2" dir="ltr">Rents are just too high leaving essentials unaffordable for many.       </span>
  </button>

  </button><button class="ProfileTweet-actionButtonUndo ProfileTweet-action--unfavorite u-linkClean js-actionButton js-actionFavorite" type="button">

      <span role="presentation" class="Icon Icon--heart Icon--medium"></span>

Universal Credit must be halted now or this will worsen.<a href="https://t.co/ur1aPwCQCn" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="http://www.mirror.co.uk/news/uk-news/universally-discredited-families-struggling-pay-11304558" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="http://www.mirror.co.uk/news/uk-news/universally-discredited-families-struggling-pay-11304558"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">http://www.</span><span class="js-display-url">mirror.co.uk/news/uk-news/u</span><span class="invisible">niversally-discredited-families-struggling-pay-11304558</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>

        <div class="feedback-action" data-feedback-type="DontLike" data-feedback-url="">
          <div class="action-confirmation dismiss-module-item">Thanks. Twitter will use this info to make your timeline better.

      <div class="stream-item-header">
          <a class="account-group js-account-group js-action-profile js-user-profile-link js-nav" href="/angie4wealden" data-user-id="859764151849189376">

          <a class="account-group js-account-group js-action-profile js-user-profile-link js-nav" href="/SELabour" data-user-id="1001454344">

        <span class="child-confirmation-text"></span>
        <span class="undo-child-feedback-action">Undo</span>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Thanks to <a href="/NanSloane" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="21607378"><s>@</s><b>NanSloane</b></a> <a href="/LabourWomensNet" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="102434818"><s>@</s><b>LabourWomensNet</b></a> and <a href="/JoCoxFoundation" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="761234166985945088"><s>@</s><b>JoCoxFoundation</b></a> there are 57 confident women politicians standing up &amp; promoting Labour values.<a href="https://t.co/AFiWc9OsVI" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/anna4labour/status/911555435265748992" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/anna4labour/status/911555435265748992"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/anna4labour/st</span><span class="invisible">atus/911555435265748992</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>

</li><li class="js-stream-item stream-item stream-item&#10;" data-item-id="911644174243500032" id="stream-item-tweet-911644174243500032" data-item-type="tweet" data-suggestion-json="{&quot;suggestion_details&quot;:{},&quot;tweet_ids&quot;:&quot;911644174243500032&quot;,&quot;scribe_component&quot;:&quot;tweet&quot;}">

  <div class="tweet js-stream-tweet js-actionable-tweet js-profile-popup-actionable dismissible-content&#10;       original-tweet js-original-tweet&#10;      &#10;       tweet-has-context&#10;       &#10;" data-tweet-id="908959129057861632" data-item-id="908959129057861632" data-permalink-path="/Redpeter99/status/908959129057861632" data-conversation-id="908959129057861632" data-tweet-nonce="908959129057861632-c9af9584-529f-416f-a6e7-9221cfe4c61c" data-retweet-id="909312615100403713" data-retweeter="angie4wealden" data-screen-name="Redpeter99" data-name="Peter Smith" data-user-id="316464915" data-you-follow="false" data-follows-you="false" data-you-block="false" data-reply-to-users-json="[{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;316464915&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;Redpeter99&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Peter Smith&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;Peter Smith&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;Peter Smith&quot;}},{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;859764151849189376&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;angie4wealden&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Angie Smith&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;Angie Smith&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;Angie Smith&quot;}}]" data-disclosure-type="" data-tweet-stat-initialized="true">

          <div class="tweet-context with-icn&#10;    &#10;    ">

      <span class="Icon Icon--small Icon--retweeted"></span>



            <span class="js-retweet-text">

        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Copy link to Tweet</button>

      <li class="embed-link js-actionEmbedTweet" data-nav="embed_tweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Embed Tweet</button>
      </li>
  </ul>
</div>

</div>

  </div>

      </div>

      <li class="embed-link js-actionEmbedTweet" data-nav="embed_tweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Embed Tweet</button>
      </li>
  </ul>
</div>

</div>

  </div>

      </div>

      

      


      
        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0"><a href="/hashtag/publicsectorpay?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>publicsectorpay</b></a> cap must go for ALL public sector workers. Nurses &amp; Police yes but also Librarians, Transport Engineers, Social workers...</p>
</div>

<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Very proud to be one of the first graduates of this amazing programme.<a href="https://t.co/M0GfG2x2MM" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/Alicemac83/status/906575007400304640" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/Alicemac83/status/906575007400304640"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/Alicemac83/sta</span><span class="invisible">tus/906575007400304640</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Angie Smith added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">
  <div class="QuoteTweet-container">
    <a class="QuoteTweet-link js-nav" href="/Alicemac83/status/906575007400304640" data-conversation-id="906575007400304640" aria-hidden="true">

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Angie Smith Retweeted Wealden Labour</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">We have a great team in Uckfield and Wealden.  If we could grow it even more imagine what we could achieve.  If you can help, let us know.<a href="https://t.co/TIuxWsz5bz" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/WealdenLabour/status/903562150064652289" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/WealdenLabour/status/903562150064652289"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/WealdenLabour/</span><span class="invisible">status/903562150064652289</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Angie Smith added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">
  <div class="QuoteTweet-container">
    <a class="QuoteTweet-link js-nav" href="/WealdenLabour/status/903562150064652289" data-conversation-id="903562150064652289" aria-hidden="true">
    </a>
    <div class="QuoteTweet-innerContainer u-cf js-permalink js-media-container" data-item-id="903562150064652289" data-item-type="tweet" data-screen-name="WealdenLabour" data-user-id="1150544347" href="/WealdenLabour/status/903562150064652289" data-conversation-id="903562150064652289" tabindex="0">
      <div class="tweet-content">
            <div class="QuoteMedia">
      <div class="QuoteMedia-container js-quote-media-container">
          <div class="QuoteMedia-singlePhoto">
    <div class="QuoteMedia-photoContainer js-quote-photo" data-image-url="https://pbs.twimg.com/media/DIoY-3AXgAAtyA3.jpg" data-element-context="platform_photo_card" style="background-color:rgba(41,64,26,1.0);" data-dominant-color="[41,64,26]">
  <img data-aria-label-part="" src="https://pbs.twimg.com/media/DIoY-3AXgAAtyA3.jpg" alt="" style="height: 100%; left: -33px;" />

  </div>

          
          
          <div class="QuoteTweet-text tweet-text u-dir" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="2" dir="ltr">Uckfield Labour has fought 4 elections in 2017 we have improved our vote share every election &amp; came agonisingly close to winning yesterday <span class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/pRSjM20r6x</span></div>

    <span class="ProfileTweet-action--reply u-hiddenVisually">
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount" aria-hidden="true" data-tweet-stat-count="0">

<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">If you need top negotiators, if you want a good deal for Britain, I would back the trade union movement &amp; <a href="/UKLabour" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="14291684"><s>@</s><b>UKLabour</b></a> over the Tories any day.<a href="https://t.co/35q5pbLtgB" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/FrancesOGrady/status/901540747228442624" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/FrancesOGrady/status/901540747228442624"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/FrancesOGrady/</span><span class="invisible">status/901540747228442624</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Alison McGovern added,</p>

          <div class="QuoteTweet-text tweet-text u-dir" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="2" dir="ltr">The govt were dead wrong to rule out the single market for any future deal. Smart negotiations = all options on the table.</div>

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Angie Smith Retweeted I was a JSA claimant</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Absolutely agree with this, UC is a nightmare: not least because it is fuelling financial abuse: <a href="https://t.co/yQEWeTQMya" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://www.womensaid.org.uk/financial-abuse-report/" class="twitter-timeline-link" target="_blank" title="https://www.womensaid.org.uk/financial-abuse-report/"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://www.</span><span class="js-display-url">womensaid.org.uk/financial-abus</span><span class="invisible">e-report/</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a><a href="https://t.co/F4fTKLL1R5" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/imajsaclaimant/status/891748016725557248" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/imajsaclaimant/status/891748016725557248"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/imajsaclaimant</span><span class="invisible">/status/891748016725557248</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Angie Smith added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">
  <div class="QuoteTweet-container">
    <a class="QuoteTweet-link js-nav" href="/imajsaclaimant/status/891748016725557248" data-conversation-id="891748016725557248" aria-hidden="true">
    </a>
    <div class="QuoteTweet-innerContainer u-cf js-permalink js-media-container" data-item-id="891748016725557248" data-item-type="tweet" data-screen-name="imajsaclaimant" data-user-id="927662736" href="/imajsaclaimant/status/891748016725557248" data-conversation-id="891748016725557248" tabindex="0">
      <div class="tweet-content">
        <div class="QuoteTweet-authorAndText u-alignTop">
            
  <div class="QuoteTweet-originalAuthor u-cf u-textTruncate stream-item-header account-group js-user-profile-link">
    <b class="QuoteTweet-fullname u-linkComplex-target">I was a JSA claimant</b><span class="UserBadges"></span><span class="UserNameBreak"></span><span class="username u-dir u-textTruncate" dir="ltr">@<b>imajsaclaimant</b></span>
  </div>

<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Yes, <a href="/PhilipHammondUK" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="2653613168"><s>@</s><b>PhilipHammondUK</b></a> <a href="/hashtag/WASPI?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>WASPI</b></a> women need a period of transition too for 6 years of loss of income.<a href="https://t.co/2QglMzQil4" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/VeeCee30/status/890985071871655936" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/VeeCee30/status/890985071871655936"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/VeeCee30/statu</span><span class="invisible">s/890985071871655936</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">#WASPI Campaign added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">
  <div class="QuoteTweet-container">
    <a class="QuoteTweet-link js-nav" href="/VeeCee30/status/890985071871655936" data-conversation-id="890985071871655936" aria-hidden="true">
    </a>
    <div class="QuoteTweet-innerContainer u-cf js-permalink js-media-container" data-item-id="890985071871655936" data-item-type="tweet" data-screen-name="VeeCee30" data-user-id="2871029992" href="/VeeCee30/status/890985071871655936" data-conversation-id="890985071871655936" tabindex="0">
      <div class="tweet-content">
        <div class="QuoteTweet-authorAndText u-alignTop">
            
  <div class="QuoteTweet-originalAuthor u-cf u-textTruncate stream-item-header account-group js-user-profile-link">
    <b class="QuoteTweet-fullname u-linkComplex-target">EU Queen. #FBPE #ABTV</b><span class="UserBadges"></span><span class="UserNameBreak"></span><span class="username u-dir u-textTruncate" dir="ltr">@<b>VeeCee30</b></span>
  </div>

          
          
          <div class="QuoteTweet-text tweet-text u-dir" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="2" dir="ltr">So <span class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="2653613168"><s>@</s><b>PhilipHammondUK</b></span> feels that a period of transition is reqd4 a change of such financial uncertainty?<span data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>WASPI</b></span> women?       <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">1</span>
  </span>

  </button><button class="ProfileTweet-actionButtonUndo js-actionButton js-actionRetweet" data-modal="ProfileTweet-retweet" type="button">
    <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="Undo retweet">
      <span class="Icon Icon--medium Icon--retweet"></span>

    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">1</span>

    <div class="ProfileTweet-action ProfileTweet-action--favorite js-toggleState">

      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount ProfileTweet-actionCount--isZero">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true"></span>
  </span>

  </button><button class="ProfileTweet-actionButtonUndo js-actionButton js-actionRetweet" data-modal="ProfileTweet-retweet" type="button">
    <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="Undo retweet">
      <span class="Icon Icon--medium Icon--retweet"></span>
      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Retweeted</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount ProfileTweet-actionCount--isZero">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true"></span>
  </span>

  </button>
</div>


    <div class="ProfileTweet-action ProfileTweet-action--favorite js-toggleState">
  <button class="ProfileTweet-actionButton js-actionButton js-actionFavorite" type="button" aria-describedby="profile-tweet-action-favorite-count-aria-890266285329842177">
    <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="Like">
      <span role="presentation" class="Icon Icon--heart Icon--medium"></span>

    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount">

  </span>

  </button><button class="ProfileTweet-actionButtonUndo ProfileTweet-action--unfavorite u-linkClean js-actionButton js-actionFavorite" type="button">

      <li class="embed-link js-actionEmbedTweet" data-nav="embed_tweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Embed Tweet</button>
      </li>
        <li class="embed-link js-actionEmbedVideo" data-nav="embed_video">
          <button type="button" class="dropdown-link"> Embed Video</button>
        </li>
  </ul>
</div>

</div>

  </div>

      </div>

      

      


      
        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">We're united, we're determined and we're many. Labour's in permanent campaign mode &amp; will fight every day until we form the next government.<a href="https://t.co/P8ZonQHHG2" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/P8ZonQHHG2</a></p>
</div>

    <div class="child-feedback-confirmation">
      <div class="child-confirmation-item">
        <span class="child-confirmation-text"></span>
        <span class="undo-child-feedback-action">Undo</span>

DWP denied her application for PIP disability benefit. She's finding it hard to cope.<a href="https://t.co/SqeijtRJQ6" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/SqeijtRJQ6</a></p>

<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Last year, the Tories quietly dropped the requirement for new schools to have water sprinklers fitted:
<a href="/hashtag/GrenfellTower?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>GrenfellTower</b></a><a href="https://t.co/hMsWqkvanx" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/AngelaRayner/status/770933022484992000" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/AngelaRayner/status/770933022484992000"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/AngelaRayner/s</span><span class="invisible">tatus/770933022484992000</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Tom Pride added,</p>

  <div class="tweet js-stream-tweet js-actionable-tweet js-profile-popup-actionable dismissible-content&#10;       original-tweet js-original-tweet&#10;      &#10;      &#10;       &#10;" data-tweet-id="875472820758818816" data-item-id="875472820758818816" data-permalink-path="/angie4wealden/status/875472820758818816" data-conversation-id="875472820758818816" data-tweet-nonce="875472820758818816-eade3a14-707b-4e6d-adb5-0f5466ed7ec3" data-tweet-stat-initialized="true" data-screen-name="angie4wealden" data-name="Angie Smith" data-user-id="859764151849189376" data-you-follow="false" data-follows-you="false" data-you-block="false" data-reply-to-users-json="[{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;859764151849189376&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;angie4wealden&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Angie Smith&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;Angie Smith&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;Angie Smith&quot;}}]" data-disclosure-type="">

      <div class="stream-item-header">
          <a class="account-group js-account-group js-action-profile js-user-profile-link js-nav" href="/angie4wealden" data-user-id="859764151849189376">

    <span class="FullNameGroup">
      <strong class="fullname show-popup-with-id u-textTruncate ">Angie Smith</strong><span></span><span class="UserBadges"></span><span class="UserNameBreak"></span></span><span class="username u-dir u-textTruncate" dir="ltr">@<b>angie4wealden</b></span></a>

Labour's share of the vote
Arundel &amp; South Downs 23% +11.5%
Wealden 22% +11.3

        <span class="u-hiddenVisually">More</span>
      </div>
  </button>
  <div class="dropdown-menu is-autoCentered">
  <div class="dropdown-caret">
    <div class="caret-outer"></div>
    <div class="caret-inner"></div>
  </div>
  <ul>

        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Labour's <a href="/angie4wealden" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="859764151849189376"><s>@</s><b>angie4wealden</b></a> on standing in a safe Tory seat: "I don't believe in paper candidates. There's no such thing as a safe seat" <a href="/hashtag/ge2017?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>ge2017</b></a><a href="https://t.co/y6WtLHZylj" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/y6WtLHZylj</a></p>

</div>

        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Im supporting the call to <a href="/hashtag/ScrapReassessments?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>ScrapReassessments</b></a> for people with <a href="/hashtag/MND?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>MND</b></a> in <a href="/hashtag/ESA?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>ESA</b></a> support group

<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Great turnout in Hailsham protest against school cuts yesterday.  Well done <a href="/helendeehan" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="868407921922764800"><s>@</s><b>helendeehan</b></a> for raising awareness.<a href="https://t.co/yQufZrVE38" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/FlatCashEd/status/868385656300503042" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/FlatCashEd/status/868385656300503042"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/FlatCashEd/sta</span><span class="invisible">tus/868385656300503042</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Angie Smith Retweeted Your Vote Matters</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">You've only got until May 22nd to register to vote. Don't lose your democratic right, exercise your fingers now and go online to vote.<a href="https://t.co/ips52a9fY0" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/YourVote_UK/status/865587125416341504" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/YourVote_UK/status/865587125416341504"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/YourVote_UK/st</span><span class="invisible">atus/865587125416341504</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Angie Smith added,</p>

Animals can't prosecute for cruelty, but we can. <a href="/hashtag/NotFunny?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>NotFunny</b></a></p>

</div>


    

    

  </div>

</div>
  



      
      

      

      

    </div>

  </button><button class="ProfileTweet-actionButtonUndo ProfileTweet-action--unfavorite u-linkClean js-actionButton js-actionFavorite" type="button">

  <ul>
    
      <li class="copy-link-to-tweet js-actionCopyLinkToTweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Copy link to Tweet</button>
      </li>
      <li class="embed-link js-actionEmbedTweet" data-nav="embed_tweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Embed Tweet</button>
      </li>
  </ul>
</div>

</div>

  </div>

      </div>

      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount ProfileTweet-actionCount--isZero ">
        <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true"></span>

  </button>
</div>

      <li class="copy-link-to-tweet js-actionCopyLinkToTweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Copy link to Tweet</button>
      </li>
      <li class="embed-link js-actionEmbedTweet" data-nav="embed_tweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Embed Tweet</button>
      </li>
  </ul>
</div>

</div>

  </div>

      </div>

      

      


      
        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">

I'll be standing up against  Tory  misrule. <a href="/hashtag/VoteLabour?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>VoteLabour</b></a></p>
